# Metla House Cleaning - Miami
> Premium residential cleaning services in Miami, Brickell, Coral Gables, Fort Lauderdale, and the Gold Coast.

## About Us
Metla House Cleaning provides premium residential cleaning services throughout Miami-Dade and Broward counties. We are a fully licensed, insured, and bonded cleaning company with background-checked professionals. Our team follows a 50-point cleaning checklist to ensure consistent, high-quality results for every home.

## Services
- **Standard Cleaning**: Regular maintenance cleaning for homes
- **Deep Cleaning**: Thorough cleaning of all surfaces and hard-to-reach areas
- **Move-In/Move-Out Cleaning**: Comprehensive cleaning for property transitions
- **Post-Construction Cleaning**: Debris and dust removal after renovations
- **Vacation Rental Cleaning**: Airbnb and short-term rental turnover cleaning
- **Same Day Cleaning**: Urgent cleaning for last-minute requests (subject to availability)

## Service Areas
Miami, Brickell, Coral Gables, Coconut Grove, Miami Beach, Bal Harbour, Sunny Isles, Aventura, Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood, Hallandale Beach, Pompano Beach, Lauderdale-by-the-Sea, Dania Beach, Weston, Pembroke Pines, Wilton Manors, Oakland Park
